analysis.key_quote: You will be weakening America by chipping away at our foundational ideals of integrity, honesty, and hard work - and you will truncate America's ability to correct course away from "bad numbers" if you close the conversation about them in this way.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concern about the integrity and honesty of data, which aligns with themes of scientific integrity and opposes any actions that would undermine these values, suggesting a stance against the proposed rule.
